Package: grails.plugin.cache.web.filter.simple

[Java] Class MemoryBlockingCache

        • grails.plugin.cache.web.filter.simple.MemoryBlockingCache
        • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
          BlockingCache

          public class MemoryBlockingCache
extends org.springframework.cache.concurrent.ConcurrentMapCache

          In-memory-based implementation of BlockingCache.

          Authors:
          Burt Beckwith
